name: geo
sql:
(type, ip) -> 
    multiIf(
        type = 'asn', toString(maxmind_geo_asn(    assumeNotNull(ip))),
        type = 'org', maxmind_geo_org(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'country', maxmind_geo_country(    assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'subdivision1', maxmind_geo_subdivision1(    assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'state', maxmind_geo_subdivision1(    assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'subdivision2', maxmind_geo_subdivision2(    assumeNotNull(ip)),
        type = 'city', maxmind_geo_city(assumeNotNull(ip)),
        NULL        
    )
